description.full: Immerse Yourself in the Word's Most Dangerous Job.  Risk it all for the ultimate pay off. Bone-crushing crab pots, razor-sharp hooks, subzero arctic winds and the unpredictable Bering Sea conspire against the brave fishermen in the quest for red gold - Alaskan King Crab. The Emmy winning series is now ready to challenge your skill, strength and stamina in one of the world's deadliest - and most lucrative - job.  - Be the captain of your own fishing vessel that you create and customize and work with or against the legendary real life captains and their authentic vessels  - Utilize a unique combination of strategy and action to capture the biggest catch  - Experience the world's toughest job - set the pots, repair the ship, sort the catch, break through the ice, rescue a man-overboard and more  - Battle unpredictable seas and ever-changing conditions in the harsh Bering Sea  - Select from unique Campaigns, both King & Opilio Crab seasons as well as Derby or Quota style competition  - Relive actual past seasons, take on rivals - online & off, fish multi-season campaigns and more

The Emmy winning series is now ready to challenge your skill, strength and stamina in one of the world's deadliest - and most lucrative - job.
